entry.title: Run calculation
entry.content:
Run computation of a dataset via a “project” that integrate bio-transformations and in silico fragmentation.

You can explore project results on metabolization graph.
entry.summary: Run computation of a dataset via a “project” that integrate bio-transformations and in silico fragmentation. You can explore project results on metabolization graph.

entry.title: Explore with Bio-Transformations
entry.content: MetWork explore candidate structures by using a set a biochemical reactions.
entry.summary: MetWork explore candidate structures by using a set a biochemical reactions.

entry.title: Load and annotate your MS data

link.title: Load and annotate your MS data

entry.content:
Load your HPLC-MS/MS data samples in .mgf format and annotate them on web interface.

You can explore the resulting molecular network with cytoscape.js integration.
entry.summary: Load your HPLC-MS/MS data samples in .mgf format and annotate them on web interface.
